career.title: Senior Director, Engineering
career.description: When I joined Guidewire, the company was beginning a cloud transformation. The goal was to shift from on-premises products to offering only cloud solutions in the SaaS model. Krak√≥w engineering teams I have led were building a crucial part of that strategic shift - the Guidewire Cloud Platform. We quickly moved from a prototype phase to a mainstream product used by numerous customers to manage online services. My primary focus at that stage was to adapt to the new scale and quickly rising demand. I was responsible for growing the team, adjusting the organization structure, and fastening the cooperation across locations. The scaling also required alignment of some engineering aspects like the architecture of our product or SDLC process so we can keep delivering frequently but at a bigger scale.

items: Responsible for engineering delivery and operations
Managing cross-site collaboration and ensuring alignment with other development centers of Guidewire
Support in introduction globally scalable processes
Work with the local HR, Finance, IT and Facilities team to help develop the center
Cultivating top talent by driving technical and leadership development

career.title: Senior Development Manager
career.description: Recently, the company has undergone several significant acquisitions that created a relatively complex and diverse environment. My focus was on bridging the gap, connecting the office with the rest of the company, and ensuring that teams could work efficiently. It included areas such as knowledge transfer, communication, goals alignment, promoting and growing local leaders, removing organization-level obstacles, process integration, assignment of projects, and building ownership of products. items: Shaping software engineering practices and processes

Alignment with senior stakeholders in the organisation

career.description: When I joined Yggdrasil, it was a rapidly growing start-up. As Head of Delivery, I was responsible for developing and delivering games for online casinos.
